title: Convergence of Biology and Local Culture: Exploring Biological Concepts with Digital Learning Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of biological classification and morphology, along with general interest in regional cultures
context.additional_context: Contextual learning linking regional traditional patterns and natural dyeing processes with biological concepts, utilizing accessible digital tools based on smartphones

learning_goals: Students can classify and explain at least three types of biodiversity found in local cultural heritage (traditional patterns/dyeing).
Students successfully complete activities connecting traditional patterns with biological morphological features using digital tools at an 80% or higher success rate.
Students improve their understanding of local culture and ability to apply biological concepts by 30% or more compared to pre-assessment through culturally responsive learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
